body.p: The market‑based measure of unvested share‑based payment transactions is allocated to the non‑controlling interest on the basis of the ratio of the portion of the vesting period completed to the greater of the total vesting period and the original vesting period of the share‑based payment transaction. The balance is allocated to post‑combination service.
